title: october 28: no two are alike
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia gets technical with the history of fingerprints and how the process became standard for criminal identification. She then talks about a special musical birthday. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
